sentences.sContent: But for those undaunted, here's our guide to circumventing internet censorship.
sentences.sContent_eng: But for those undaunted, here's our guide to circumventing internet censorship.
sentences.sCn: 但是对于那些大无畏者，这里是我们的绕过互联网审查的指南。

sentences.sContent: At one end of the party are some undaunted neocons, keen still to slay monsters across the seas.
sentences.sContent_eng: At one end of the party are some undaunted neocons, keen still to slay monsters across the seas.
sentences.sCn: 共和党内的一端是一些无所畏惧的新保守主义者，他们仍然热衷于飘洋过海去斩杀妖魔鬼怪。

trans.tranOther: not afraid of continuing to try to do something in spite of difficulties or danger
